Your mileage will vary depending on how you drive and maintain your vehicle, driving conditions and other factors.Reviews:  * Beyond its history of reliability and high resale value, the Accord is now more varied than ever. Whether you want a no-fuss and highly economical sedan, a sporty V6-powered coupe or a hybrid that attains 50 mpg in the city, the 2014 Accord offers something for everyone. Source:    * The Accord is synonymous with Honda and has been known for nearly four decades as a reliable, comfortable, pragmatic way to move families. What began as a 2-door hatchback in 1976 has grown into today's full-size sedan and coupe. Like the rest of the car, the 2014 Accord's 5-passenger interior is a pleasing step forward. The cabin boasts soft-touch materials for a quality feel. The front seats are comfortable, and the driver's seat actually toned down the lumbar support. The rear seats have even more room, as does the trunk. Sleek, rippled sheet metal defines a more streamlined exterior that has shrunk around an interior that feels roomier than previous generations. The most surprising thing about the Accord is its refined continuously variable transmission (CVT). Mated to the 4-cylinder, this CVT feels much like a normal automatic, mimicking gear changes. Even a base Accord has good power for acceleration and passing, yet attains an impressive mileage on the highway. Move up to a V6 model with 6-speed automatic transmission, and the Accord is downright quick. For the individual looking to consume less the 2014 Accord comes in a Hybrid version as well. This operates on a 141-hp 2.0-liter, 16-valve i-VTEC 4-cylinder engine and a 55-hp lithium-ion battery pack for a net hp of 196. The Hybrid can achieve ratings of 50 cty and 46 hwy. To help maximize efficiency on the road, the Accord Hybrid seamlessly shifts between three distinct drive modes: EV Drive, Hybrid Drive and Engine Drive. EV Drive is 100% electric, and generally is used during braking and when starting from a stop. Hybrid Drive uses the fuel engine and electric motor to provide extra zip during acceleration, and once your Accord Hybrid is cruising with highway efficiency, Engine Drive takes over. If you want a hassle-free, pleasing family car with a reputation for quality and an immediate familiarity, you can't go wrong with the Accord. Yes, it is a 2006, but then it is almost new and a new Superduty is ranging up to $41,615. Call me directly, do not request for me to call you first, scammers request this.  1. New 6.0 bullet proof motor: Below will be what is entails in bullet proofing and installing a new motor. $23,000 through the Ford Dealership. 2. New Garret high performance Turbo-what that means verse a stock turbo $1500 3. New AC Pump with pumped system and all new fluids $800 4. New Clutch fan 5 New exhaust 6. Uplift camper $1500 7 9" lift kit 8. 20" mag wheels and 37x13.50R20LT aggressive tires (80% tread) $2500 9. New gunmetal gray paint job $4000 10. step ups 11. New brakes 12. Transmission filter has been changed with new fluids 13. Front and rear pumpkin oils have just been changed 14. Dash instrument control pump for front brakes. ** I will throw in the original 4 wheels and tires 265/ R70/17  Prior to doing all this work the vehicle had only 180,000. Motor is new and is slightly broken in with 700 miles from break-in oil, oil has now been changed. Break in time should be around 5,000. Blocks, heads and crankshafts are 100% magnaflux tested to avoid cracked components. Crankshaft is checked for size, reground, if necessary, and micro polished to OEM specifications. Camshaft is reground, and micro polished to OEM specifications. Connecting rods have new bushings installed and both large and small end are re-machined to OEM specifications. All connecting rods are de-magnetized. Both heads new valves and are vacuum tested to ensure the quality of the valve job. Both heads were pressure tested. Core plugs are 100% stainless steel to avoid corrosion. Long Block Includes: Block, Crankshaft, Camshaft, Pistons/rings, Timing gears, Connecting rods, Lifters, Main/rod bearings, Piston cooling tubes, Cam bearings, Valve train, Cylinder heads/valves, New Oil pan & pick-up tube, Oil pump, Oil Cooler, Front Cover, Rear Cover - Ford. Water Pump, Valve Covers. Injectors, Vibration damper, Glow plugs, High pressure oil pump, High pressure oil rails, Injection pressure regulator valve, Crankshaft position sensor, ICP Injection control pressure sensor, Camshaft position sensor, Engine oil pressure sensor, EOT.  Engine is basically new with all new parts - Engine oil temperature sensor new and a brand new Turbo.  I was advised by a highly qualified diesel company here in White City Oregon to have the California EGR emissions Valve blocked on this new motor for increased performance and "for engine safety". This is only for California emissions standards, it now passes all the the western states emission standards for licensing, an SCT Computer Tuner is needed to remove the EGR delete engine light, at a cost $600. Wolf Diesel performance company completed everything after the engine was installed. This SCT tuner rewrites the system and is married only to one motor. SO YOU FULLY UNDERSTAND, Removing the EGR valve is a major benefit to longevity and safety of a motor. This factory Valve is a smog valve only required in California and can cause real damage if the system begins to fail, as in a domino effect. This EGR robs the engine of a good air flow and failure can happen around 150,000 miles. When failure happens oil goes into the intake, then destroys the head gaskets, then the turbo fails and then the motor blows. All Diesels Systems should be flushed at 40-50 thousand miles to keep them clean. Oil Cooler replacement should be done at 120,000 miles to keep the safety of good cooling and motor safety. This New Turbo has special bearing, which have been upgraded to a more high performance for another extra motor performance and protection. I still have the old turbo for view. The Garett factory thrust bearings are of 270 degrees verses the new upgraded steel bearing that has 360 degrees on the shaft. Also this new turbo has a Gas Piston Ring, which is a better oil seal. Garret high performance, who sells Turbos now has much better parts then the original stock turbos that came from the Ford factory. That is what you will get if you buy a used diesel truck off some car lot. Garett high performance says that most Turbos should be rebuilt at around 180,000 miles. If a Turbo goes from either over use or from an EGR failure the metal from the Turbo can then take out the motor. With a good clean running motor and good maintained Diesel motor can run up to 750,000 miles. GARRETT - POWERMAX TURBO - 6.0 POWERSTROKE - (04-07) Price: $1,249.00.  Bullet proofing a diesel motor: In addition to replacing or blocking the EGR, most 6.0L Power Stroke owners also replace the head gaskets either out of necessity or preventatively. They'll also upgrade from the factory head bolts to high-strength studs, and either clean the factory turbo vanes, which can easily become stuck, or replace the turbo with the higher performance one, such as the Garrett PowerMax. It is also important to replace the factory water pump with a much better stronger one and also upgraded fuel injection control module (FICM) can also be a benefit. Please look up bullet proofing a diesel motor on the internet, explanation is for a power Stroke motor "bulletproofing" is when it has at least four of the five of these actions addressed. These five areas are: Oil cooler, EGR cooler, head studs, fuel injection control module (FICM), and water pump.  THIS MOTOR IS BULLET PROOFED.   When buying a used Diesel truck it is important to know what you are buying, it is not all about how nice it looks. if there is an external engine oil cooler? Does it have the new head studs? Does it have an upgraded EGR cooler or is it block, or high performance water pump? If the answer is yes, then the engine has in fact been bulletproofed". A Ford dealer replacement motor includes labor is $23,000 to replace a STOCK Diesel motor, which will be bullet proofed,  BUT THE STOCK PREVIOUS DIESEL MOTORS ARE NOT BULLET PROOF.  OK, a brand new 2021 F250 diesel truck off the show room floor at Lithia Ford with this bullet proof motor is $56,655 and has the California EGR valve which decrease the performances.   Find a good used F250 will have the old stock motor with lots of miles and will not include a New Garrett Turbo, AC unit, Clutch fan or any other extras that I have mention to bring this vehicle up and beyond the stock older diesels trucks. . It is a very complicated amount of work to replace a large diesel motor... The entire cab has to be lifted off the frame to remove the motor and trans. Just so it is understood all that has been done to this vehicle would have cost about $40,000 to bring it up to the new standards it now has. A very fair price of $25,000 for all that has been done to this truck and I have even reduced it to 23,900 this is very low considering in any comparison.  This is a real sweet price and deal for what this truck has been done to it..  For those that what to know who did the work, Wolf Diesel Mechanics in White City had a strong hand in this operation. I have all receipts to everything mentioned and had a two year motor warranty from , however since it has taken me over two years to complete this truck almost back to new my warranty has run aground before i even got it out on the road. Cab was removed, motor removed and new motor installed at another shop prior to the truck going over to Wolf for full completion. So, please lets not get into it over the phone. Nor do I want to get into whether I have more photos. The vehicle has been covered and I have no intention of taking more photos, come see it, hear it and ride in it, then you will not need more photos. Don't come if you are not serious, as this is a serious truck and i don't play games.

Selling my 2004 BMW 330Ci. We have owned this car for a few years now and it has been very good to us. Garage kept and used as a weekend driver. All maintenance done on time. 3.0 liter 6 cylinder with the rare 6-speed transmission. 60K ORIGINAL MILES. Everything works great. AC blows ice cold. Top was replaced a few years back and works great. Recent oil change done 500 miles ago. DISA valve recently replaced. Upgraded sound system with 4 Polk audio component speakers, paired with an Alpine 4 channel amplifier and a matching Alpine head-unit.  Previous owner had entire steering rack replaced right before we purchased it from him. Car was involved in a front end collision and was professionally repaired, which is why it has a salvaged title. This doesn't effect the way the car drives. For its age, this car is in immaculate condition. The E46 330ci is getting extremely hard to find, especially with these miles, color and a  6-speed manual. If this car was a clean title vehicle, i would be asking $15k minimum. Car has m3 wheels (Made in Italy) paired with Michelin pilot tires, and they have plenty of life left on them. Driver side taillight needs light replaced and car needs a tailpipe welded on. Was quoted $75 at Performance muffler, but haven't had the time to take it in. I have priced the car accordingly. We are only selling, as we don't drive it. Our loss is your gain. Just paid $500 for a complete detail (pictures were taken before detail). All in all, if you're looking for an extremely low mile, reliable convertible, at a fraction of the price, this is the car for you. Title in hand and ready to sign over to its new owner. First with $8999 takes it!

Our F-150 Platinum's interior features heated and ventilated front seats, a leather-wrapped multi-function steering wheel, keyless entry/ignition, and dual-zone automatic climate control to help you get as much work done as efficiently as possible. Additionally, the full-color SYNC infotainment system with Bluetooth and USB/Aux inputs is on hand for your entertainment needs. Our Ford offers adaptive cruise control, a back-up camera, rear parking sensors, MyKey parental controls, anti-lock brakes, traction/stability control, and advanced airbags help keep you out of harm's way. Our F-150 is ready for work and play, so Print this page and call us Now... We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership!Our custom lift kits are installed by our own OEM-trained technicians and feature full front struts instead of spacers and upgraded rear shocks to create a smoother ride and better off-road performance. 99% of our competitors do not use these types of quality components because the cost is almost double that of a traditional 6-inch spacer kit. We need to buy cars from customers every day because of the huge demand in the used vehicle market. It isn't necessary for you to buy a vehicle either.  We'd love to purchase your vehicle regardless of age or mileage in most cases.			 						 			What if I want to trade in my vehicle but still owe more than it's worth.			 						 			This is another very common situation that usually 			 			 won't 			 			prevent you from trading your vehicle and taking delivery of your next New or PreOwned vehicle.			 						 			 Are you guys really 1price? Won't you negotiate?			 						 			We've found that every single customer wants our bottom-line best price up front. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help.			 						 			We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.			 						 			So, I like this vehicle I'm looking at, but I'd rather not talk to anyone yet. What do I do?			 						 			COPY AND PASTE the link and in this ad, and find the CONTACT US tab on the right side of the Showroom Page.  Just ask "Where might I see this vehicle?". Someone will respond promptly.			 						 			 I think this vehicle might be the one for me, but I live several hours away. Can I prevent someone else from buying it before I get there?			 						 			Yes. We have very simple process for this very common situation. Just give us a call.			 						Accessories & color may vary. Dealer not responsible for errors or omissions. For product manufacturer or EPA registration information, see an AutoNation Service Associate for details.Enter this link to see more images plus all other inventory we have available: http://lyv.cc/5AQB22017 Audi Q7 Premium Plus AWD All Wheel DrivePrice: $37,998.00Audi PeoriaAsk for: Sales Department‚òé¬†(480) 582-5157Peoria, AZ 85382			Frequently Asked Questions			 						 						 			Do I really need to call first, can I just take my chances and hope the vehicle is there?			 						 			If youre seeing this ad, it is likely that the vehicle IS for sale within the Autonation network. Our intent is to prevent you from showing up after the vehicle has been moved.  Give us a call, let us physically touch it and confirm its availability. Well provide the local dealership name and address so that you dont waste your time.			 						 			 This post is almost 30 days old. Surely you don't still have this vehicle, do you?			 						 			If the post still has a phone number, we almost certainly still have the vehicle at one of your local Autonation dealerships. Simply dial the number above and we'll be happy to point you to the correct store. We may even bring the vehicle to a store near you.			 						 			You say you help people with less than perfect credit, are you a Buy Here - Pay Here lot?			 						 			No. We are not a buy here - pay here lot. However, because we are the largest retailer of New and Used vehicles in the U.S. we have access to banks and credit unions that can be a tremendous benefit to extremely challenged credit.			 						 			Can I really secure financing with zero down payment?			 						 			Many customers actually take delivery 			 			without a checkbook or credit card.			 			 While this isn't a possibility in every situation, it is often an option when transacting with an Autonation dealership.			 						 			 Do you take trade-ins?			 						 			Yes.			 			 We need to buy cars from customers every day because of the huge demand in the used vehicle market. It isn't necessary for you to buy a vehicle either.  We'd love to purchase your vehicle regardless of age or mileage in most cases.			 						 			What if I want to trade in my vehicle but still owe more than it's worth.			 						 			This is another very common situation that usually 			 			 won't 			 			prevent you from trading your vehicle and taking delivery of your next New or PreOwned vehicle.			 						 			 Are you guys really 1price? Won't you negotiate?			 						 			We've found that every single customer wants our bottom-line best price up front. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help.			 						 			We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.			 						 			So, I like this vehicle I'm looking at, but I'd rather not talk to anyone yet. What do I do?			 						 			COPY AND PASTE the link and in this ad, and find the CONTACT US tab on the right side of the Showroom Page.  Just ask "Where might I see this vehicle?". Someone will respond promptly.			 						 			 I think this vehicle might be the one for me, but I live several hours away. Can I prevent someone else from buying it before I get there?			 						 			Yes. We have very simple process for this very common situation. Just give us a call.			 						Accessories & color may vary. Dealer not responsible for errors or omissions. Our number is 480 833 2200.  We have finance and shipping options.  We take trade-ins and have another 30 commercial work trucks that are ready for sale, so give us a call and take one home tonight. This 2010 Ford F650 Extended Cab Super Duty XL Box Truck, Hi-Box, 26FT L x 108H x 102W powered by the Cummins 6.7L turbo diesel, and the Allison automatic has only 136K miles.  This straight truck is a non-cdl 25999 GVW so anyone can drive it, but it is NOT CARB compliant.  It's equipped with air suspension, air seat, air brakes, cold ac, tilt, dual 50 gal fuel tanks, amfm, cd, tilt, cruise, and it seats 6.  The box is a high box which is slat lined, aluminum roof and has a 3500LB aluminum level liftgate by Interlift.  I just got done driving this delivery truck and loved it.  Tons of power, plenty of speed, ac blows cold, cruise works, the air seat and air suspension works excellent, a great truck to drive.  We just completed the services on the transmission, differential, power steering, ac, and completed the LOF which means fresh oil, and fuel filters.  We also replaced the drive belts, wiper blades, fire extinguisher and that was about it.  We did have to fix some leaks in the air seat system, replaced some shrader valves and orfice tubes in ac system, repaired the rollup door, repaired and lubricated the liftgate, and that was about it.  These tall box trucks are very hard to find.

If youre seeing this ad, it is likely that the vehicle IS for sale within the Autonation network. Our intent is to prevent you from showing up after the vehicle has been moved.  Give us a call, let us physically touch it and confirm its availability. Well provide the local dealership name and address so that you dont waste your time.			 						 			 This post is almost 30 days old. Surely you don't still have this vehicle, do you?			 						 			If the post still has a phone number, we almost certainly still have the vehicle at one of your local Autonation dealerships. Simply dial the number above and we'll be happy to point you to the correct store. We may even bring the vehicle to a store near you.			 						 			You say you help people with less than perfect credit, are you a Buy Here - Pay Here lot?			 						 			No. We are not a buy here - pay here lot. However, because we are the largest retailer of New and Used vehicles in the U.S. we have access to banks and credit unions that can be a tremendous benefit to extremely challenged credit.			 						 			Can I really secure financing with zero down payment?			 						 			Many customers actually take delivery 			 			without a checkbook or credit card.			 			 While this isn't a possibility in every situation, it is often an option when transacting with an Autonation dealership.			 						 			 Do you take trade-ins?			 						 			Yes.			 			 We need to buy cars from customers every day because of the huge demand in the used vehicle market. It isn't necessary for you to buy a vehicle either.  We'd love to purchase your vehicle regardless of age or mileage in most cases.			 						 			What if I want to trade in my vehicle but still owe more than it's worth.			 						 			This is another very common situation that usually 			 			 won't 			 			prevent you from trading your vehicle and taking delivery of your next New or PreOwned vehicle.			 						 			 Are you guys really 1price? Won't you negotiate?			 						 			We've found that every single customer wants our bottom-line best price up front. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help.			 						 			We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.			 						 			So, I like this vehicle I'm looking at, but I'd rather not talk to anyone yet. What do I do?			 						 			COPY AND PASTE the link and in this ad, and find the CONTACT US tab on the right side of the Showroom Page.  Just ask "Where might I see this vehicle?". Someone will respond promptly. If youre seeing this ad, it is likely that the vehicle IS for sale within the Autonation network. Our intent is to prevent you from showing up after the vehicle has been moved.  Give us a call, let us physically touch it and confirm its availability. Well provide the local dealership name and address so that you dont waste your time.			 						 			 This post is almost 30 days old. Surely you don't still have this vehicle, do you?			 						 			If the post still has a phone number, we almost certainly still have the vehicle at one of your local Autonation dealerships. Simply dial the number above and we'll be happy to point you to the correct store. We may even bring the vehicle to a store near you.			 						 			You say you help people with less than perfect credit, are you a Buy Here - Pay Here lot?			 						 			No. We are not a buy here - pay here lot. However, because we are the largest retailer of New and Used vehicles in the U.S. we have access to banks and credit unions that can be a tremendous benefit to extremely challenged credit.			 						 			Can I really secure financing with zero down payment?			 						 			Many customers actually take delivery 			 			without a checkbook or credit card. This is another very common situation that usually 			 			 won't 			 			prevent you from trading your vehicle and taking delivery of your next New or PreOwned vehicle. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help.			 						 			We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.			 						 			So, I like this vehicle I'm looking at, but I'd rather not talk to anyone yet. What do I do? If youre seeing this ad, it is likely that the vehicle IS for sale within the Autonation network. Our intent is to prevent you from showing up after the vehicle has been moved.  Give us a call, let us physically touch it and confirm its availability. Well provide the local dealership name and address so that you dont waste your time.			 						 			 This post is almost 30 days old. Surely you don't still have this vehicle, do you?			 						 			If the post still has a phone number, we almost certainly still have the vehicle at one of your local Autonation dealerships. Simply dial the number above and we'll be happy to point you to the correct store. We may even bring the vehicle to a store near you.			 						 			You say you help people with less than perfect credit, are you a Buy Here - Pay Here lot?			 						 			No. We are not a buy here - pay here lot. However, because we are the largest retailer of New and Used vehicles in the U.S. we have access to banks and credit unions that can be a tremendous benefit to extremely challenged credit.			 						 			Can I really secure financing with zero down payment?			 						 			Many customers actually take delivery 			 			without a checkbook or credit card.			 			 While this isn't a possibility in every situation, it is often an option when transacting with an Autonation dealership.			 						 			 Do you take trade-ins?			 						 			Yes.			 			 We need to buy cars from customers every day because of the huge demand in the used vehicle market. It isn't necessary for you to buy a vehicle either.  We'd love to purchase your vehicle regardless of age or mileage in most cases.			 						 			What if I want to trade in my vehicle but still owe more than it's worth.			 						 			This is another very common situation that usually 			 			 won't 			 			prevent you from trading your vehicle and taking delivery of your next New or PreOwned vehicle.			 						 			 Are you guys really 1price? Won't you negotiate?			 						 			We've found that every single customer wants our bottom-line best price up front. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help.			 						 			We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.			 						 			So, I like this vehicle I'm looking at, but I'd rather not talk to anyone yet. What do I do?			 						 			COPY AND PASTE the link and in this ad, and find the CONTACT US tab on the right side of the Showroom Page.  Just ask "Where might I see this vehicle?". Someone will respond promptly. If youre seeing this ad, it is likely that the vehicle IS for sale within the Autonation network. Our intent is to prevent you from showing up after the vehicle has been moved. If the post still has a phone number, we almost certainly still have the vehicle at one of your local Autonation dealerships. Simply dial the number above and we'll be happy to point you to the correct store. We may even bring the vehicle to a store near you.			 						 			You say you help people with less than perfect credit, are you a Buy Here - Pay Here lot?			 						 			No. We are not a buy here - pay here lot. However, because we are the largest retailer of New and Used vehicles in the U.S. we have access to banks and credit unions that can be a tremendous benefit to extremely challenged credit.			 						 			Can I really secure financing with zero down payment?			 						 			Many customers actually take delivery 			 			without a checkbook or credit card.			 			 While this isn't a possibility in every situation, it is often an option when transacting with an Autonation dealership.			 						 			 Do you take trade-ins?			 						 			Yes.			 			 We need to buy cars from customers every day because of the huge demand in the used vehicle market. It isn't necessary for you to buy a vehicle either.  We'd love to purchase your vehicle regardless of age or mileage in most cases.			 						 			What if I want to trade in my vehicle but still owe more than it's worth. Are you guys really 1price? Won't you negotiate?			 						 			We've found that every single customer wants our bottom-line best price up front. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help.			 						 			We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.			 						 			So, I like this vehicle I'm looking at, but I'd rather not talk to anyone yet. What do I do? 2015 *GMC* *Terrain* *SLT* *Sport Utility*.‚òé Call Our Internet Department @ (623) 900-1757.Vehicle Comments:Quicksilver Metallic 2015 GMC Terrain SLT-2 FWD 6-Speed Automatic 3.6L V6 DGI DOHC VVTRecent Arrival!Awards:* JD Power Automotive Performance, Execution and Layout (APEAL) Study, JD Power Initial Quality Study * 2015 IIHS Top Safety Pick * 2015 KBB.com Brand Image AwardsReviews:* The GMC Terrain's 'tweener size and unique styling definitely appeal to those who want something styled like a truck, but without truck-like handling. The available V6 engine also gives the Terrain surprisingly good towing capacity for its class - 3,500 pounds. Source: KBB.com* Premium look inside and out; quiet interior; comfortable highway ride; powerful available V6 engine; spacious and adjustable backseat. Source: Edmunds* The GMC Terrain is designed to be the perfect combination of luxury and utility and it all starts with distinct, bold design features and striking grille. Every Terrain model has standard aluminum wheels to reduce weight and enhance fuel economy. The Terrain's available programmable power liftgate opens to your desired height with the push of a button. Projector beam headlights and fog lamps keep visibility high regardless of weather conditions. The terrain has a refined interior which features a color touch radio and an acoustic design meant to minimize outside noise. As a crossover, the terrain has the comfort and utility of a small SUV. A 60/40 split and folding second-row maximizes space and there is up to 39.9 inches of rear leg room. The available 8-Way power driver's seat and remote activated heated front seats promise a comfortable ride regardless of trip length. At the heart of Terrain's performance and power is the 2.4L Engine or opt for the available 3.6L V-6 engine. The 6-speed transmission offers a wide ratio spread for power in the low gears and efficiency in the high gears. The Standard rear vision camera displays in the center stack touch-screen, and allows for easy, confidant parallel parking. A 7 inch color touchscreen with navigation is available and OnStar with 4G LTE is turns the car into a mobile hotspot. Finally, the four-wheel independent suspension offers a smooth, steady ride and a precise feel for the road. The Terrain is equipped with 6 airbags, including thorax and side-impact. The available Forward Collision Alert provides an audible and visual signal when a potential collision is detected. The   Departure Warning informs a driver when they have wandered from a   without using a turn signal. 2004 Toyota Camry LE, 2.4L, Automatic, PS, PW, PDL, Tan cloth interior. Cold AC, has an aftermarket radio with Bluetooth & USB port. 361,000 miles. Paint has clear coat peel and a few dings/dents on the exterior. Interior is in decent shape.  Purchased in March 2021 and added new headlights, new hood strut, new radiator and hoses and thermostat, new CV axles, and new front pads & rotors. While driving home at night recently, the car started to misfire. Coolant was found on the top of 3 cylinders. The head gasket is fine I am told. The leak wasn't a result of overheating because it was leaking externally instead of internally. There is a known issue with these 4 cylinder engines where the head bolts strip out of the block allowing coolant to leak into the top of the cylinders. Looks like it has happened on this car. It does not drive.  Shop says it needs a heli-coil kit to fix the threads or needs a new engine block. Either way, it's too much money for me to repair. It ran well before this incident. http://www.timesert.com/html/toyota.html  Asking $1000 as is. Clean title ready to transfer.

This fantastic old gal...she's amazing!  2nd owner, always senior owned and we have decades of vehicle paper history to pass on to the new lucky owner.  She's in really good condition, whether you want to go to the burger joint, dancing or on a cross country trip--she'll get you there.  These are all original miles, the car is stock with blue velour interior, no rips or tears, the windows all work, the air conditioning AC is ice cold, new tires about 500 miles ago (with warranty) and the V8 under the hood will rival just about any car on the road.  She steady maintains 15-18 mpg, uses regular unleaded but drives like she's premium and the ride down the road will remind you of sitting on your favorite sofa.    There is enough room in the trunk to transport a small elephant, add some golf clubs and probably a stroller with some additional soccer equipment.  There's also a spare tire back there.    Of course power windows, door locks, tilt, cruise, power antenna but the radio doesn't work for some reason, there's a cassette player for those retro drives around town, the body is straight, the glass is all good.  You're welcome to come and see her, talk with her and see if she might be a good fit for your family.  I am not responding to any offers until you come and see her, and I can't be lowballed because she is obviously part of my family and that would just be wrong.  So feel free to text (fastest way) and ask any questions, come take her for a friendly spin, and tell all of your friends that you've officially driven the nicest, sweetest old lady car on the planet and to plan the barbecue, cause  you're bringing her home!!!  Even if you plan to drive her cross country after you fly to Phoenix from some far off galaxy to pick her up, she'll be a breeze to drive safely home and what a surprise to your friends and family once you arrive.  I've got 100% confidence in this old gal.  Come and get her if you think you're worthy.    Oh, and she won the 1990 Car of the Year award by Motor Trend back in the day...

Come take this thing off my hands!    You'll want to tow it as it has a blown head gasket.  It will start and run fine idling but within 2-3 miles it will start to over heat.  My daugter bought this 6 months as a project.  She spent some time and $ but got tired of it.   She left to College out of state and asked me to get rid of it.  I'm ready to have it gone.  It was a custom handicap van.  Sweet tall ceilings.  Perfect for a conversion.  It is not 4x4.  All the carpet had been removed,  walls have all been removed (we still have them) back seats are not bolted down.  The good-   - It's a Van!  Endless possibilities.  Ice cream truck, camper conversion, or you could go hippy style. - Cold ac - New stereo - New waterpump, radiator, thermostat, steering box - tires in great shape    First $1000 takes it. Don't offer me less until next week.  Clean Title notarized and ready to go.  Text is best.  Do not call to help me sell it.  Do not call me asking to send me a verification code.  I'm not an idiot.

Vehicle DescriptionVehicle DescriptionWe just acquired a stunning example of a JDM (RHD) 1992 Toyota Land Cruiser 80 series TURBODIESEL. Besides all that goodness, the beast is EXTENSIVELY upgraded and has factory triple lockers (front, rear, and center locks) for maximum traction. PRICING AT BOTTOM OF EMAIL. Call 310 918 3885 to secure your dream rig.The 80 series Turbodiesel is extremely rare, and this one is in amazing shape. It is an overland/offroad/camping DREAM RIG.This 1992 Toyota Land Cruiser is a right-hand-drive example that was imported to the US from Japan. Power is supplied by a 4.2-liter turbodiesel inline-six paired with a four-speed automatic transmission, a Marlin Crawler part-time two-speed transfer case, and locking front, center, and rear differentials. The truck is finished in black over a gray interior, and modifications added include steel front and rear bumpers, a winch, rock sliders, a roof rack with an awning, lifted suspension, aftermarket 16 alloy wheels wearing 35 Cooper tires, leather front seats, a touchscreen stereo, a Nardi steering wheel, and an ARB air compressor. This HDJ81 shows 349k kilometers (~217k miles) and is offered with a clean title.The body received a driver-quality repaint in black with matching fender flares some time ago and features an aftermarket grille, window rain guards, a fender-mounted mirror, and turbo graphics. Additional modifications include an ARB front bumper that houses a Smittybilt winch and Rigid spotlights, a 44 Labs rear bumper that has been painted with Line-X coating, White Knuckle rock sliders, and a Bowfin roof rack equipped with a Yakima awning. Main flaws include small chips in the windshield, areas of peeling and chipped paint, and scratches around the body. This truck has been highly modified for Offroading, and is able to tackle anything you can throw at it. The 16 SCS alloy wheels wear 35 Cooper STT Pro tires, and a matching spare is mounted to the swing-out carrier out back. The truck is equipped with Aisin manually-locking front hubs and Longfield hub gears. A power steering cooler has been added, and suspension modifications include the following components:Delta Vehicle Systems coil springsFox shocksFront coil spacers with 2 air bumps1 Dobinson rear coil spacersWelded knuckle ball gussetsDelta Vehicle Systems high-clearance rear panhard lift bracketWitts End HD rear sway bar links with an oversize sway barHeavy-duty tie-rod endsOld Man Emu steering stabilizerThe right-hand-drive cabin features gray leather front seats and a cloth rear bench (cloth can be reupholstered to matching leather for an additional fee). Amenities include power windows and locks, a sunroof, a Pioneer touchscreen head unit paired with aftermarket speakers, LED lighting, keyless entry, a custom tailgate storage unit, a Delta Vehicle Systems attic rack, and WeatherTech front floor liners. An ARB twin air compressor is mounted behind a panel in the cargo area. A wood-rimmed Nardi steering wheel fronts metric instrumentation including a 180-km/h speedometer that contains a six-digit mechanical odometer reading approximately 349k kilometers (~217k miles). A Delta Vehicle Systems console has been added below the dash and houses aftermarket boost and exhaust temperature gauges. The 4.2-liter turbodiesel inline-six features an intercooler as well as a dual battery setup, a high-amp alternator, an engine block and radiator hose heater, a turbo boost controller, and a straight-pipe exhaust system. The timing belt and water pump have been replaced and an oil change was recently performed. Power is sent to the rear or all four wheels through a four-speed automatic transmission fitted with an aftermarket cooler and a Marlin Crawler part-time two-speed transfer case. The truck is equipped with front, center, and rear locking differentials as well as a full-float rear axle. Additional underbody photos are provided in the gallery.Here is a link to a Highway drive and Cold Start:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NcjsMIwyqK0https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jk-CL-2grdwHere is a link to 200+ photos as well:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1DK8S4yThNn55e93ZgDWWUuTxpnBejSDq?usp=sharingVehicle is a true example of a dream adventure rig. With its triple lockers, and the extensive list of upgrades this is a hell of a deal for the adventure-minded.If you're interested don't hesitate to call 310 918 3885 to secure your dream rig. For sale is my 2007 Mercedes Benz S550 with the full factory sport and luxury package. It has the AMG body trim and 19" AMG chrome wheels. The car has never had an accident or damage and I have the clean Carfax showing regular dealer maintenance. Beautiful black exterior with black nappa leather interior and there are NO marks or tears anywhere. I bought it from the second owner in southern California.  It has a 5.5 liter V-8 with around 400 hp and a 7-speed transmission with paddle shifters on the steering wheel. Car is loaded with all factory options including auto-closing doors and keyless entry, it has night vision, push button start, distronic cruise control, active dynamic seats, heated and cooled massaging seats in the front, and rear reclining seats which are also heated and cooled! Rear window shade, high-end Harmon Kardon sound system, back-up camera, auto closing trunk and many other options. All windows have the high-end tint and UV protection. Yes, it's fully loaded and everything works.  The car now has 171,400 miles (only 12,200 miles a year) but you would never guess it. I really looks and drives like half the mileage. The engine is strong and quiet and the whole suspension was worked on a few years ago with replacement struts and pump. There are substantial receipts for maintenance work that has been done on the car. Comprehensive full maintenance since new by only Mercedes Benz dealers. The transmission shifts smoothly with no issues. There is nothing wrong with this car and EVERYTHING works! You couldn't find a nicer Mercedes S550 for the money.   I'm asking $9,4500 or best offer. Please don't waste my time with low offers as the car is well worth the price. Cash only, no trades are wanted. I am in no hurry as I am looking for the right S63. This is a private sale so there's no sales tax payable on the sale.  Please call or text me 520-497-one388 George.   Keywords: Mercedes Benz, mercedes benz s 550, audi, bmw, lexus, S550, s500, s55

Dressed for passenger service, the Express Van crushes the largest of SUVs, providing seating for up to 15 people. In the Express Cargo Van, the Regular Wheelbase 1500, 2500 and 3500 models have 270.4 cubic feet of cargo space. Knowing that no matter what the mission, the Express Van will need to be prepared, Chevrolet gave its van a beefed-up suspension, available extended-length cabs, a choice of gasoline or diesel engines and even optional all-wheel drive (AWD) in the 1500. All Express Cargo and Passenger Vans are equipped with stability control, 4-wheel anti-lock disc brakes and dual front airbags. In the Express Cutaway 3500 and 4500 models, you will be getting a solid foundation for the finished vehicle your upfitter will complete for you. The Express Cutaway can be upfitted to become various vehicles like a school bus, shuttle bus, ambulance, service vehicle and more. It also gives you the choice between gas and diesel engines, and has anti-lock brakes and dual front airbags. Come check out the 2015 Express Van or Cutaway that meets your needs today! Source: Edmunds  * Are you split between the desire for a well-heeled sports sedan and a comfortable luxury cruiser? Lexus GS 350 and 450h sedans for 2015 are sufficiently adept in both schools, with performance and luxury packages that allow buyers to further move the needle in either direction. Source:    * The Lexus GS exemplifies innovation, craftsmanship and design. The exterior features an Inverted trapezoid spindle grille. In addition to Bi-Xenon High-Intensity Discharge headlamps, the GS has LED rear combination lights. The interior of the GS features a wood interior trim, with a leather-trimmed interior including the steering wheel and shift knob. 10 way power-adjustable seats, which feature lumbar support, come standard with the GS and all of the seats feature height-adjustable headrests. A power tilt-and-slide moonroof with one-touch opening and closing functionality means a spring day is just one press away. The Lexus twelve-speaker Premium Sound System with Automatic Sound Levelizer and DVD/CD player will provide entertainment you need on trips of any size. The GS is propelled by a 3.5L V6 engine or you can opt for the 3.5L V6 Hybrid for an amazing 29cty/34hwy mpg. Safe and secure, the GS has a 10-airbag system and available Blind Spot Monitor with Lane Keep Assist and Lane Departure Warning. Finally, a vehicle theft-deterrent and engine-immobilizer system is there to protect your new GS. 99  Extended Passenger 4x4  5.4 Gas  64,000 Miles  Ujoint 4x4 Conversion  The conversion area does have some surface rust and afternoon with a wire brush and chassis paint and it will be good.  The body has zero rust on it.  Decent shape in the body but mechanically its great. The driver side fender could be replaced if the crunch bothered you.  The van has massive flex off-road pushed the fender out of alignment.  Then open the door at the same time and you get a crunch.  Fortunately these fenders are available at any wrecking yard and in even in the same color.  Spend a weekend with a buffer and you would have a nice looking van.  Tossed some home depot cabinets in the van for a last minute road trip.  Was a pleasure to drive and decent gas mileage.

Hi all, I have my 2013 Volkswagen GTI (2 door) up for sale. I‚Äôve had it since last May of 2020. My buddy had it since new and rarely drove it as he put 40,000 miles on it over the course of 7 years. I‚Äôve put 2,300 miles on it since ownership. It gets driven on average about 10 miles a week since I only have a mile commute each day. It is parked in a garage every night with a battery tender and has never been smoked in. I had it professionally detailed on 03/31/2021 by Pit Stop Auto Detailing and the engine has been cleaned, carpet was extracted/shampooed, paint was clay barred/ polished/sealed with Gtechniq Easy Coat sealant (Should last 4-6 months). Essentially looking to sell to someone that is more into it than I am now. All it really needs is a FMIC/DSG tune and it's solid. I‚Äôm a full-time student and need a truck.  The car sat for two years without being driven prior to me taking ownership of it. Once I purchased it, I did routine maintenance that was necessary. Since last May, it has been converted from Accuair to Airlift 3P. It still has height sensors on the vehicle and I have the conversion wiring harness to make them work, but have not installed it so it can be height sensing instead of pressure sensing. The Airlift was installed by a shop named RNZ Conceptz in San Diego prior to moving out to Arizona. Since moving here, all work has been done by AZ Euros. It did have the carbon cleaning, spark plugs replaced, and fuel filter changed at Desert Car Care of Chandler in June of 2020. AZ Euros has replaced the front struts with the new model of Airlift Slam Series struts and an alignment all done within the previous 6 months. The vehicle passes smog, has a tune, and looks pretty decent. It‚Äôs quick, sounds good, and is a lot of fun to drive.  Open to offers but I‚Äôm looking to get $17,000. Text works as well. I have Tuesday/Wednesdays off. Located in Chandler, AZ. This car has been babied forever. Mileage as of 03/31/2020 sits at 42,300. The mileage will go up extremely slowly, as I mentioned previously that it is driven 10 miles a week.  Hit me with offers and all your weird trades. Prefer trucks but some offers can be entertained. Message for VIN for Carfax.  Will take cash or check. Don't text me with some scam or code to follow to verify this post is real. Your number will be blocked immediately.  Moving on to specifics about the vehicle:  Air Lift Performance 3P (Has Accuair Height Sensors installed, need to calibrate for 3H) Air Lift Slam Series Front Bags  Air Lift Performance series rear  AVS Water Trap Dual Viair 444C Compressors Custom trunk setup with hardlines done by Boden Autohaus (Hardlines have since been removed. Had plans to remake them but chose to let the new owner take care of it.) TyrolSport Deadset Rigid subframe kit  Custom Catless 42 Draft Design Turbo-back Exhaust Apr Carbonio Intake Assembly  GMR CH-3 (18x9.5et35 front, 18x10et35 rear) brushed face, chrome barrel Raxles CV‚Äôs Studio RSR roll cage  OEM Golf R rear bumper  OEM Golf R sideskirts  Custom rear widebody  SRS-TEC front fenders  Shaved front bumper  Carbon front lip imported from Germany (forgive me, I forget the name and can‚Äôt find the company anywhere)  Custom diamond stitched dash mat  Suede headliner Diamond stitched sunroof cover Diamond-Stitched Junction Produce Garson Luxury Neck Pads Cobb Accessport Stratified Tune for 91/93 Octane- ‚ÄúStage 2‚Äù Tinted windshield (70%) with a film that blocks out 99% of UV rays  (Solar Gard VortexIR Ceramic Film Series) Front windows are tinted 50% Rear windows are tinted 25%  Stock parts included: Air intake assembly  Stock exhaust  2 235/40/18 Hankook Ventus v2  Battery was replaced 03/22/2020  CONS: Not huge cons by any means.  Front/rear bumper could use new clips. They‚Äôre secured by bolts but the side clips must be broken or something. Cheap fix. Up for sale is my 2008 Acura TSX. It's automatic trans, 4 door, red on tan leather interior. I bought this car in 2011 with 43k on it, it now has 233,000 miles. I've done almost all the work on it myself and it's been excellently maintained and is in perfect running condition. The interior is in great shape as well, no pets or kids in it.  The exterior is in rough shape, the paint is fading and the clear coat is peeling off in several areas. The front and rear bumpers have scrapes and scratches and a few dings. I know the car isn't pretty but it's what's under the hood that counts and this car is ready for another 100,000 miles!  I have all the maintenance records and receipts from when I bought it, and a google doc of all maintenance and repairs with dates and mileages, which I can send for review and I'll email to the buyer.   I recently put new Yokohamas on all 4 corners, and I replaced the radiator fan assembly recently. The AC blows ice cold, everything works great on it mechanically, it's good to go. No leaks, no weird stuff.   Come to Gilbert to see the car, I can meet you at the Burger King on the corner of Juniper and Gilbert.   Clean Pennsylvania title in hand, ready to go!
